channel.title: aws on Documentation for Hugo Learn Theme
channel.description: Recent content in aws on Documentation for Hugo Learn Theme

item.title: Aws Get Access Key Secret Key
item.description: 教你如何找到AWS Access Key ID and Secret Access Key Env aws Step 按照 教你如何找到AWS Access Key ID and Secret Access Key 完成 1-5 Step 1. Visit the Amazon Web Services web console. Step 2. Click My Account/Console at the top right corner of the web page. In this case User Name is Alexander. Step 3. In the drop-down list click the “Security Credentials” option. Step 4. Then you will be redirected to the “Your Security Credentials” page and see the following pop-up window: Step 5.

item.title: Rancher2 Install Base Aws Ubuntu
item.description: aws中ubuntu安装rancher2.0 Env Env-a cloud: aws os: ubuntu 16.04 docker: 17.03.2-ce Env-b cloud: aws os: Amazon Linux AMI 2018.03 docker: 17.12.1-ce 这里的env-b可以不看, 因为效果与env-a相同 Rancher versions: rancher/server or rancher/rancher: rancher/server 2.0.2 **Docker version: 17.03.2-ce **Operating system and kernel: ubuntu 16.04 Linux ip-172-31-12-229 4.4.0-1060-aws #69-Ubuntu SMP Sun May 20 13:42:07 UTC 2018 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux **Type/provider of hosts: AWS **Setup details: single node rancher **Environment Template: Kubernetes
